languages.text: "Дворянские семьи пытаются умыть руки — как ожидаемо. И все же в ваше отсутствие это их долг — следить, чтобы планета отрабатывала подати и приносила славу и доход казне. Пускай аристократические дома займутся беженцами и не останавливаются, пока последний беженец не будет пристроен к делу!"

"The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"
languages.original_text: "Дворянские семьи пытаются умыть руки — как ожидаемо. И все же в ваше отсутствие это их долг — следить, чтобы планета отрабатывала подати и приносила славу и доход казне. Пускай аристократические дома займутся беженцами и не останавливаются, пока последний беженец не будет пристроен к делу!"

traits.locale_text: "Noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet is paying its toll, and bringing glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats take care of the refugees and to not stop until the last refugee is employed at some job!"

"Noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet is paying its toll, and bringing glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats take care of the refugees and to not stop until the last refugee is employed at some job!"

"The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

"The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats take care of the refugees, and make sure they don't stop until every last refugee has some task to fulfil!"

"The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats take care of the refugees, and make sure they don't stop until every last refugee has some task to fulfil!"

"The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

"The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

"The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

languages.text: “可想而知，那些贵族家族打算置身事外。然而，他们的职责就是在您缺席期间，确保行星能履行缴纳什一税的义务，为国库带来荣耀和收入。就让那些贵族负责照顾这些难民吧，确保每个难民都去干活！！”
languages.original_text: "The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

traits.locale_text: “可想而知，那些贵族家族打算置身事外。然而，他们的职责就是在您缺席期间，确保行星能履行缴纳什一税的义务，为国库带来荣耀和收入。就让那些贵族负责照顾这些难民吧，确保每个难民都去干活！！”
“可想而知，那些贵族家族打算置身事外。然而，他们的职责就是在您缺席期间，确保行星能履行缴纳什一税的义务，为国库带来荣耀和收入。就让那些贵族负责照顾这些难民吧，直到他们让每个难民都找到工作为止！”

languages.text: «Las casas nobles intentan lavarse las manos. Qué previsible. Y, sin embargo, es su deber velar por que el planeta cumpla con su obligación del diezmo y aporte gloria e ingresos al tesoro en su ausencia. Deje que los aristócratas se ocupen de los refugiados, ¡y que no paren hasta que el último de ellos esté trabajando!».
languages.original_text: "The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

traits.locale_text: «Las casas nobles intentan lavarse las manos. Qué previsible. Y, sin embargo, es su deber velar por que el planeta cumpla con su obligación del diezmo y aporte gloria e ingresos al tesoro en su ausencia. Deje que los aristócratas se ocupen de los refugiados, ¡y que no paren hasta que el último de ellos esté trabajando!».

languages.text: 「貴族たちはこの件から手を引こうとしている...まあ、予想通りの動きだ。しかし、彼らには、惑星が十分の一の義務を果たし、あなたの不在中に国庫に栄光と収益をもたらすのを見届ける義務がある。貴族たちに難民の世話をさせよ、難民の最後の一人が何かの任務を任されるまでに、彼らに世話をさせ続けるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

traits.locale_text: 「貴族たちはこの件から手を引こうとしている...まあ、予想通りの動きだ。しかし、彼らには、惑星が十分の一の義務を果たし、あなたの不在中に国庫に栄光と収益をもたらすのを見届ける義務がある。貴族たちに難民の世話をさせよ、難民の最後の一人が何かの任務を任されるまでに、彼らに世話をさせ続けるのだ！」
「貴族たちはこの件から手を引こうとしている...まあ、予想通りの動きだ。しかし、彼らには、惑星が十分の一の義務を果たし、あなたの不在中に国庫に栄光と収益をもたらすのを見届ける義務がある。貴族たちに難民の世話をさせよ、難民の最後の一人が何かの任務を任されるまでに、彼らに世話をさせ続けるのだ！」

languages.text: « Les maisons nobles qui tentent de s'en laver les mains... Comme c'était prévisible. Pourtant, il est de leur devoir de faire en sorte qu'en votre absence, la planète prenne ses responsabilités et apporte gloire et finances au trésor. Laissons-les donc s'occuper des réfugiés, qu'ils s'y tiennent jusqu'à ce que chacun d'entre eux ait une tâche à accomplir ! »
languages.original_text: "The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

traits.locale_text: « Les maisons nobles qui tentent de s'en laver les mains... Comme c'était prévisible. Pourtant, il est de leur devoir de faire en sorte qu'en votre absence, la planète prenne ses responsabilités et apporte gloire et finances au trésor. Laissons-les donc s'occuper des réfugiés, qu'ils s'y tiennent jusqu'à ce que chacun d'entre eux ait une tâche à accomplir ! »

languages.text: "Die Adelshäuser versuchen, sich von allem zu distanzieren – wer hätte das gedacht. Und doch ist es ihre Pflicht, dafür zu sorgen, dass der Planet seinen Zehnt bezahlt und in Eurer Abwesenheit Ruhm für das Protektorat und Geld für die Schatzkammer generiert. Die Aristokraten sollen sich um die Flüchtlinge kümmern und erst ruhen, wie jeder von ihnen wieder eine Arbeit hat!"
languages.original_text: "The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Adelshäuser versuchen, sich von allem zu distanzieren – wer hätte das gedacht. Und doch ist es ihre Pflicht, dafür zu sorgen, dass der Planet seinen Zehnt bezahlt und in Eurer Abwesenheit Ruhm für das Protektorat und Geld für die Schatzkammer generiert. Die Aristokraten sollen sich um die Flüchtlinge kümmern und erst ruhen, wie jeder von ihnen wieder eine Arbeit hat!"

"Die Adelshäuser versuchen, sich von allem zu distanzieren — welch Überraschung. Und doch ist es ihre Pflicht, dafür zu sorgen, dass der Planet seinen Zehnt bezahlt und in Eurer Abwesenheit Ruhm für das Protektorat und Geld für die Schatzkammer generiert. Die Aristokraten sollen sich um die Flüchtlinge kümmern, und sie sollen nicht eher ruhen, bis jeder einzelne Flüchtling eine Aufgabe hat!"

languages.text: "Soylu haneler, bu hususta sorumluluktan kurtulmaya çalışıyor. Ne kadar öngörülebilirler... Ancak yine de sizin yokluğunuzda gezegenin aşar yükümlülüğünün yerine getirildiğinden ve hazineye ihtişam ile gelir katıldığından emin olmak onların vazifesi. Bırakalım mültecilerle aristokratlar ilgilensin. Her biri mülteciye yerine getirecek bir görev bulana dek durmasınlar!"
languages.original_text: "The noble houses are trying to wash their hands of this — how predictable. And yet, it is their duty to see to it that the planet meets its tithe obligation and brings glory and revenue to the treasury in your absence. Let the aristocrats see to the refugees and not stop until every last one of them has been put to work!"

traits.locale_text: "Soylu haneler, bu hususta sorumluluktan kurtulmaya çalışıyor. Ne kadar öngörülebilirler...
